name: Gerber 06149 Folding Gator-Mate Clip Point Knife

reviews.name: Gerber Gator Mate Folder Fine-Edge Sheath Knife With Clip-Point Blade
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this knife prior to going to Iraq and I have been using it in Iraq for the last two months and I have been very happy with it the knife comes very sharp from the package and maintanes an edge extremely well it also takes an edge fairly easily the only complaint I have is that the pouch is kind of tight and difficult to get the knife in and out of.
reviews.title: 06 May 2008

reviews.name: Gerber Gator Mate Folder Fine-Edge Sheath Knife With Clip-Point Blade
reviews.reviewText: I've owned this knife for over 10 years and still use it to this day. Over the years it's taking a beating and if it ever breaks I will go buy another. Gerber knives have become my knife brand of choice. They offer great quality for a reasonable price and put some decent styles out there vs. just an ordinary pocket knife.
reviews.title: A+++++++++++++

reviews.name: Gerber Gator Mate Folder Fine-Edge Sheath Knife With Clip-Point Blade
reviews.reviewText: I love this knife - however, I wish Walmart would have clarified the ad to not show both knife types (didn't know which one I was going to get until the knife showed up-but it was the one I wanted).
reviews.title: Love it!
